Business Coaching

My vocation in life is to help people become the best they can be. My Personal Coaching helps leaders find their leadership style and excel at leading their teams to achieve their objectives.

​

It is suitable for both new leaders looking for help and existing leaders looking to move their leadership to the next level.

How do I Coach?

  • With a high level of awareness 
  • Working with you with truthful, sincere generosity
  • Always supportive, yet challenging when you need me to be
  • Sharing experience to empower others
  • From the heart
  • I approach each person and problem without judgement or shame, 
  • I deal with any problem, issue or goal you provide impartially and neutrally with no bias
  • I provide a safe and supportive environment for you to be open about any issues or thoughts you may have.

What can you expect

Find Your Blind Spots
Moving Your Leadership to the Next Level
Help and support with current issues with practical advice and no judgement
Help you find your strength and your authentic leadership
Help you identify stumbling blocks and how to overcome them
Practical, real-world tools

Mindset Coaching

Evolve Your Mindset

Along with traditional coaching, I also specialise in coaching around leaders evolving their mindset using Adult Development Theory. This coaching helps you move to a more efficient mindset supercharging your leadership.

 

We can also use this coaching to understand your own leadership model's limits and boundaries and where your leadership style might be struggling. Through coaching, we can identify these boundaries and develop tactics and approaches to move past them, making you a significantly more effective leader. 

Past Transformations

He is solutions focussed with coaching mindset that I have personally benefited from. I have witnessed fellow teammates also develop under his wing and would not hesitate to work with Phil again - anytime!

I had the opportunity to work with many agile coaches in my career and Phil is definitely among the ones I am most grateful to have met.

I could first-hand experience the difference he made in the organization that both of us were part of, in terms of culture and values as well as supporting to lay the foundations of collaboration, constructive feedback and continuous improvement.

I truly believe Phil is living the values that are at the heart of Agile, such as servant leadership, autonomy and purpose. In my opinion there is no better trait in an agile coach - and in any professional for that matter - than being true to what they are preaching, as you can fully trust them that they will drive change for the better. Phil is the living proof of that.
